# CT Realty Media

> CT Realty Media is a premium real estate photography and media production company serving Connecticut, Rhode Island, and Massachusetts. We specialize in HDR photography, cinematic video tours, drone/aerial media, Matterport 3D virtual tours, virtual staging, and floor plans for real estate agents, brokers, and property managers.

## About
- [Homepage](https://www.ctrealtymedia.com/)
- [About Us](https://www.ctrealtymedia.com/about)
- [Contact](https://www.ctrealtymedia.com/contact)

## Services
- [All Services](https://www.ctrealtymedia.com/services)
- HDR Photography: Professional interior and exterior real estate photography with HDR processing for vibrant, true-to-life images that sell homes faster.
- Cinematic Video Tours: Hollywood-quality property walkthrough videos with drone footage, music, and professional editing.
- Drone / Aerial Media: FAA Part 107 certified drone photography and video showcasing property lots, neighborhoods, and surrounding areas.
- Matterport 3D Virtual Tours: Immersive 3D walkthroughs that let buyers explore properties remotely from any device.
- Virtual Staging: AI-powered virtual staging that transforms empty rooms into beautifully furnished spaces.
- Floor Plans: Professional 2D and 3D floor plans for MLS listings and marketing materials.

## Booking

## Service Area
CT Realty Media serves the following regions:
- Connecticut (all counties)
- Rhode Island
- Western Massachusetts
